desc: Traditional bespoken badger-hair shaving brushes mindfully designed & made in the US by passion-driven wet-shaving enthusiasts with commitment quality not scale

layout.text: WE ARE PASSION-DRIVEN DESIGNER-MAKERS OF FINE SHAVING BRUSHES. OUR PURPOSE IS TO CREATE AND OFFER TO THE WET-SHAVING COMMUNITY PRODUCTS OF THE KIND AND QUALITY WE WANT FOR OURSELVES. OUR MISSION IS TO ELEVATE THE EXPERIENCE OUR CUSTOMERS DERIVE FROM SHAVING.
